sense.def:
Suspense
je razburjenje ali nestrpno pričakovanje nečesa, kar se bo kmalu zgodilo.

seg.quote: I try to add an element of suspense and mystery to my novels.

sense.def:
To keep someone in suspense
pomeni odlašati s tem, da bi nekomu povedali nekaj, kar bi želel vedeti.

seg.quote: I did not leave him in suspense, but quickly informed him that he had passed.
